actions.text: Amendment SA 1891 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1891 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4186) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to publish an annual report on the use of deepfake technology, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1891 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1891 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to publish an annual report on the use of deepfake technology, and for other purposes.
